result.execSummary:
The defendant Martin Mendoza-Sanchez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Violate State/County Institution Laws, a class C misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.73.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: 30 days to pay or CV Judgment.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Final Judgment
Ice Immigration Detainee Request Form
$443 due.  Failure to pay, CV Judgment.  kmk

Attorney Thomas Binger appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Jeremy Chavez.  Interpreter Leo Martin in court.  Clerk: PT
Interpreter Martin is sworn in.  Case is resolved.  DE pleads No Contest; found guilty by the court.  Sentencing arguments made.    Defendant is ordered to submit to a DNA sample & pay DNA surcharge and notice is given.   Defendant is sentenced to 30 days in the Kenosha County Jail and is given credit for 30 days - TIME SERVED.  Court costs & surcharge is due in 30 days or Civil Judgment.  Appeal Rights given.

Due to the unavailability of Atty Chavez and with the OK of ADA Binger, JSH on 2/18/16 and JT on 2/19/16 are to be rescheduled.  Atty Chavez's motion to withdraw as counsel to be heard on 3/11/16 at 9:10.  JSH 4/14/16 at 1:00.  JT 4/18/16 at 8:30.
to Withdraw as Counsel and Affidavit of Jeremy T. Chavez in Support of Motion.  (Hearing 2/18/16 at 1:00.)
Motion for Dismissal filed by def. from KCDC.  (Copy mailed to D.A. and Atty Chavez by clerk.)
Scheduling Order

Attorney Thomas Binger appeared for the State.  Def. appeared (in custody) with Atty Jeremy Chavez.  Clerk K. Zirbel.  Def. is unsure if he wants to enter a plea today.  Court sets a jury status hearing for 2/18/16 at 1:00 and a jury trial on 2/19/16 at 8:30.  If plea to be entered, to be done on 2/18/16 at 1:00.  Bond continued.

Attorney Thomas Binger appeared for the State.  Def. appeared (in custody) with Atty Jeremy Chavez and assisted by Spanish interpreter Leo Martin.  Clerk K. Zirbel.  Case is resolved; to be a plea and sentencing on 1/15/16 at 10:00.  Bond continued.

Attorney Thomas Binger appeared for the State.  Def. appeared (in custody) with Atty Jeremy Chavez and assisted by Spanish interpreter Leo Martin.  Clerk K. Zirbel.  Atty Chavez requests time to contact def.'s New York attorney to determine status of immigration hold, if any.  Status conf. 1/8/16 at 10:00.  Bond continued.
At the request of Atty Chavez, pretrial on 11/20/15 at 9:00 has been changed to a plea hearing on 12/11/15 at 8:50.  Request for Spanish interpreter changed to 12/11/15.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.  kmk

Not Guilty plea entered.    Deft demands jury trial.  PTC on 10/2/15 @ 140 p.m. & FPT on 11/20/15 @ 9 a.m.  $500  Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond event).  Amended complaint filed.
